experience.sectionDescription: Building impactful solutions across diverse industries and technologies

achievements: Developed cloud-based solutions using .NET & NodeJS + ReactJS
Architected and led development of a government web service application
Delivered project on time and within budget
Built medical software for patient vital sign analysis
Developed microservices for Airbnb and Hotel Booking integrations
Developed enterprise software in JavaScript and .NET
Created and managed .NET applications and ReactJS websites
Improved deployment pipeline, reducing release time by 30%

guestbook.title: Digital Guestbook
guestbook.description: Create your unique conference-style ticket with AI-generated colors based on your mood
guestbook.joinDescription: Join the guestbook and get your own unique AI-generated ticket!
guestbook.signInDescription: Choose your preferred method to sign in and create your personalized ticket
guestbook.termsText: By signing in, you agree to create a personalized ticket and optionally leave a message
guestbook.describeMood: Create your first ticket by describing your mood
guestbook.changeMood: Change your mood to regenerate colors
guestbook.tellMood: Tell us your mood and get a unique color palette
guestbook.moodPlaceholder: Describe your current mood, favorite colors, or what inspires you...
guestbook.moodExamples: Examples: "Feeling like a sunset over the ocean" or "Energetic and vibrant like a neon city"
guestbook.moodRequired: Please describe your mood or style first
guestbook.signInError: Failed to sign in. Please try again.
